title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: Nothing is left of the ancient forest of Falkland except somenatural wooding at Drumdreel, near Strathmiglo, the oaks having beenruthlessly cut down by Cromwell to build fortifications at Dundee.

title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance
author: Grant, James
snippet: It was a glorioussummer day; that morning a shower had faUen, andeverything looked fresh and beautiful; the Rose-loch,with its flowery islets, where the snowy swan and duskyouzel budt theh nests among the water-lilies, wasglittering with hght; and the old woods of Falklandand Drumdreel rustled theh heavy fohage in the gentlewind.
